title: harlequininja
author: harlequininja
content: Hi guys, just read that Luke Dashjr got hacked and his wallet was drained completely. Has anybody some specifics about the circumstances. I'm a bit surprised that there is no information on the forum about what has happened yet. It seems like pretty fundamental developments?!

comments.author: Edwardard

comments.body: Thanks for the hint I'll lock this one!
